T02: To set up your panel, create an admin user with a password. To enable Google reCAPTCHA v2 on the login page, fill in the CAPTCHA fields. Leave them empty if you donâ€™t want to use CAPTCHA. You can create reCAPTCHA keys
T03: For the best experience, please use a larger screen device to view this page.
LOGOUT_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to log out?
LOGOUT_MESSAGE_SUB: You will be signed out of your account and redirected to the login page.
LOGOUT_MESSAGE_SUB_2: You can return to the panel whenever you want. 🙂
NAME: name
DELETE_OCSERV_GROUP_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
DELETE_GROUP_MESSAGE_SUB: After deleting the group, its configuration file will be removed from the server, and users will fall back to the default group settings.
DELETE_OCSERV_USER_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
DISCONNECT_OCSERV_USER_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to disconnect this user?
LOCK_OCSERV_USER_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to lock this user?
UNLOCK_OCSERV_USER_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to unlock this user?
SHOW_STATUS_DESC: Prints the status and statistics of the server
SHOW_IP_BAN_POINTS_DESC: Prints all the known IP addresses which have points
SHOW_IROUTES_DESC: Prints the routes provided by users of the server
SHOW_SESSIONS_VALID_DESC: Prints all the valid for reconnection sessions
SHOW_SESSION_DESC: Prints information on the specified session
SHOW_USER_DESC: Prints information on the specified user
SHOW_ID_DESC: Prints information on the specified ID
